This time, we will be talking about Morning Musume。 Stay, this time with Akemi Haga of Morning Musume。 23's Akane Haga and Juice- Juice's Sakura Ishiyama.

Well, the other day, I was at the Morning Musume。 23 25th Anniversary Concert Tour
Grad Quarter Century at Nippon Budokan has just ended.
Thank you to everyone who came to the concert and to those who watched the live broadcast and live viewing.
This Halo! I can't talk about my impressions of the concert yet, since it was recorded before the Nippon Budokan concert,
I think it was a very exciting 25th anniversary show.
The Nippon Budokan concert also marked the unveiling of the new members.
We, Morning Musume。 23, we have two new 17th term members, Haruka Inoue and Ayako Yumokeda,
I am really looking forward to seeing what kind of combination they will show us.
And Juice-Juice also has a new member, doesn't it?
Yes, Mifu Kawashima joined Juice-Juice.
She is a very pure and cute girl, and when she talks, she is very fluffy,
She is very pure and cute when she talks, but when she performs, she shows us how cool and proper she is,
I have a lot to learn from her,
I have a lot to learn from her, and since I am her first junior member, I feel that I have to keep growing up.
I saw you cry a lot at Juice-Juice's performance at Nippon Budokan.
Seeing her crying, I cried a lot by myself in the audience,
I thought Mifchan was so cute like that.
I hope you are looking forward to the growth of the new members and our activities under the new organization.
I look forward to your continued support.
I will also be participating in the "Halo! I am sure that the performance at Nippon Budokan will be broadcasted on Halo!

Morning Musume。 23's Akane Haga and Juice-Juice's Sakura Ishiyama present "Halo! Station.
From here, we would like to talk a little about each other.
I'm going to ask you some questions, so please answer them without thinking too much.
So, here we go.
Sakura Ishiyama says she likes to shop alone. What is your latest nice purchase?
Sneakers.
Her second new single since joining the group will be released on July 12.
What do you think has made Sakura-chan matured since her last single?
She danced a lot.
A commemorative event is also being held to celebrate the release. What is a release event like for you?
It's a place where I try my best to get people who don't know Juice-Juice to stop by.
What color of clothes do you often wear?
Black.
This Halo! STE will be distributed on June 28, so tomorrow, on June 29, it will be exactly one year since I joined Juice-Juice.
What is the first word that comes to mind when you look back on the past year?
Effort.
Thank you very much.
So, I would like to ask you, did you make a lot of final efforts?
When I first joined the company, I had a hard time learning how to dance and sing, and there were many days when I wondered what to do,
But I watched the videos of the older members every day and watched the Huri V videos, and I think I did a great job during the year,
I also made an effort to grow up and work harder since I had new juniors for the first time.
They are wonderful.
I asked her what color of clothes she often wears. When I looked at Juice-Juice's Instagram, I got the impression that she wears a lot of different colors,
But I still think black is the best.
In the end, yes, I still wear a lot of black.
When I post on Instagram, I try to wear colorful clothes as much as possible.
That's right.
I often take pictures when I wear colorful clothes,I often take pictures when I wear clothes that have colorful colors on them,
But I still think black is the most common color.
I wear black a lot.
I see. Thank you very much.

Next, I would like to ask a question to Ms. Haga. Please give me your best regards.
You are crazy about film cameras, so if you were to take pictures of the new members, what kind of scenes would you like to capture?
Haruka would like to take pictures of shaved ice, and Ako would like to take pictures in the forest.

My sister told me it was really hot, so I focused on the temperature.

I eat more protein.

It's cute.

Is it shinobue?
Shinobue.
Thank you very much.
I was wondering why shinobue?
What is shinobue?
Shinobue is a flute that is often heard along with taiko drums in o-hayashis and the like.
The flute that sounds like a "huru-huru" is a shinobue.
I used to play it as a club activity when I was in elementary school.
I decided to give it a try for the first time in a long time when the 2020 self-restraint period was in effect.
I never got that deep into it.
But I still think it's cool that people can play instruments.
So I still want to be able to play an instrument.
That's great.
I would love to hear your shinobue.
I will try my best to do it.
